textâ€¹The next two lemmas help us rewrite terms in the proof  of honest verfier zero knowledge.â€º

lemma zr_rewrite: 
  assumes z: "z = (x*c + r) mod (order ğ’¢)" 
    and r: "r < order ğ’¢"
  shows "(z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c) mod (order ğ’¢) = r"
proof(cases "x = 0")
  case True
  then show ?thesis using assms by simp
next
  case x_neq_0: False
  then show ?thesis 
  proof(cases "c = 0")
    case True
    then show ?thesis 
      by (simp add: assms)
  next
    case False
    have cong: "[z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c = x*c + r] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
      by (simp add: cong_def mult.assoc z)
    hence "[z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c = r] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
    proof-
      have "z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c > x*c" 
        by (metis One_nat_def mult_less_cancel2 n_less_m_mult_n neq0_conv prime_gt_1_nat prime_order trans_less_add2 x_neq_0 False)
      then show ?thesis
        by (metis cong add_diff_inverse_nat cong_add_lcancel_nat less_imp_le linorder_not_le) 
    qed
    then show ?thesis
      by(simp add: cong_def r)
  qed
qed

lemma h_sub_rewrite:
  assumes "h = â™g [^] x" 
    and z: "z < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c)) = â™g [^] z âŠ— inv (h [^] c)" 
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof(cases "x = 0")
  case True
  then show ?thesis using assms by simp
next
  case x_neq_0: False
  then show ?thesis 
  proof-
    have "(z + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c) = (z + (order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c))"
      using z by (simp add: less_imp_le_nat mult_le_mono) 
    then have lhs: "?lhs = â™g [^] z âŠ— â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c)" 
      by(simp add: nat_pow_mult)
    have " â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c) =  inv (h [^] c)"  
    proof(cases "c = 0")
      case True
      then show ?thesis by simp
    next
      case False
      hence bound: "((order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c) > 0"
        using assms x_neq_0 prime_gt_1_nat prime_order by auto 
      then have "â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*x*c- x*c) = â™g [^] int ((order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c)"
        by (simp add: int_pow_int) 
      also have "... = â™g [^] int ((order ğ’¢)*x*c) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (x*c))" 
        by (metis bound generator_closed int_ops(6) int_pow_int of_nat_eq_0_iff of_nat_less_0_iff of_nat_less_iff int_pow_diff)
      also have "... = â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*x*c) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (x*c))"
        by (metis int_pow_int) 
      also have "... = â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*x*c) âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] x) [^] c)"
        by(simp add: nat_pow_pow)
      also have "... = â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*x*c) âŠ— inv (h [^] c)"
        using assms by simp
      also have "... = ğŸ­ âŠ— inv (h [^] c)"
        using generator_pow_order
        by (metis generator_closed mult_is_0 nat_pow_0 nat_pow_pow)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (simp add: assms(1)) 
    qed
    then show ?thesis using lhs by simp
  qed
qed

lemma hvzk_R_rewrite_grp:
  fixes x c r :: nat
  assumes "r < order ğ’¢"
  shows "â™g [^] (((x * c + order ğ’¢ - r) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c) mod order ğ’¢) = inv â™g [^] r"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have "[(x * c + order ğ’¢ - r) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c = order ğ’¢ - r] (mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof-
    have "[(x * c + order ğ’¢ - r) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c  
              = x * c + order ğ’¢ - r + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c] (mod order ğ’¢)"  
      by (smt cong_def One_nat_def add_diff_inverse_nat cong_diff_nat less_imp_le_nat linorder_not_less mod_add_left_eq mult.assoc n_less_m_mult_n prime_gt_1_nat prime_order trans_less_add2 zero_less_diff)
    hence "[(x * c + order ğ’¢ - r) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c  
              =  order ğ’¢ - r + order ğ’¢ * x * c] (mod order ğ’¢)"
      using assms by auto
    thus ?thesis 
      by (simp add: cong_def mult.assoc)
  qed
  hence "â™g [^] ((x * c + order ğ’¢ - r) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * x * c - x * c) = â™g [^] (order ğ’¢ - r)"
    using finite_carrier pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  thus ?thesis using neg_power_inverse 
    by (simp add: assms inverse_pow_pow pow_generator_mod)
qed

lemma hv_zk: 
  assumes "(h,x) âˆˆ R_DL"
  shows "Schnorr_Î£.R h x c = Schnorr_Î£.S h c"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "Schnorr_Î£.R h x c = do {
      r â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
      let z = (x*c + r) mod (order ğ’¢);
      let a = â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c) mod (order ğ’¢)); 
      return_spmf (a,c,z)}"
    apply(simp add: Let_def Schnorr_Î£.R_def init_def response_def)
    using assms zr_rewrite R_DL_def 
    by(simp cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  also have "... = do {
      z â† map_spmf (Î» r. (x*c + r) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
      let a = â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c) mod (order ğ’¢)); 
      return_spmf (a,c,z)}"
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def)
  also have "... = do {
      z â†  (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
      let a = â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢)*x*c - x*c)); 
      return_spmf (a,c,z)}"
    by(simp add: samp_uni_plus_one_time_pad pow_generator_mod)
  also have "... = do {
      z â†  (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
      let a = â™g [^] z âŠ— inv (h [^] c); 
      return_spmf (a,c,z)}"
    using h_sub_rewrite assms R_DL_def 
    by(simp cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by(simp add: Schnorr_Î£.S_def S2_def map_spmf_conv_bind_spmf)
qed

textâ€¹We can now prove that honest verifier zero knowledge holds for the Schnorr â€¹Î£â€º-protocol.â€º

lemma honest_verifier_ZK: 
  shows "Schnorr_Î£.HVZK"
  unfolding Schnorr_Î£.HVZK_def
  by(auto simp add: hv_zk R_DL_def S2_def check_def valid_pub_def challenge_space_def cyclic_group_assoc)

textâ€¹It is left to prove the special soundness property. First we prove a lemma we use to rewrite a 
term in the special soundness proof and then prove the property itself.â€º

lemma ss_rewrite:
  assumes "e' < e"
    and "e < order ğ’¢" 
    and a_mem:"a  âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and h_mem: "h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and a: "a âŠ— h [^] e = â™g [^] z" 
    and a': "a âŠ— h [^] e' = â™g [^] z'"
  shows  "h = â™g [^] ((int z - int z') * inverse ((e - e')) (order ğ’¢) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
proof-
  have gcd: "gcd (nat (int e - int e') mod (order ğ’¢)) (order ğ’¢) = 1" 
    using prime_field 
    by (metis Primes.prime_nat_def assms(1) assms(2) coprime_imp_gcd_eq_1 diff_is_0_eq less_imp_diff_less 
            mod_less nat_minus_as_int not_less schnorr_base.prime_order schnorr_base_axioms)
  have "a = â™g [^] z âŠ— inv (h [^] e)" 
    using a a_mem 
    by (simp add: h_mem group.inv_solve_right)
  moreover have "a = â™g [^] z' âŠ— inv (h [^] e')" 
    using a' a_mem 
    by (simp add: h_mem group.inv_solve_right)
  ultimately have "â™g [^] z âŠ— h [^] e'  = â™g [^] z' âŠ— h [^] e"
    using h_mem 
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) a a' h_mem a_mem cyclic_group_assoc cyclic_group_commute nat_pow_closed)
  moreover obtain t :: nat where  t: "h = â™g  [^] t" 
    using h_mem generatorE by blast
  ultimately have "â™g [^] (z + t * e')  = â™g [^] (z' +  t * e) "
    by (simp add: monoid.nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow)
  hence "[z + t * e' = z' +  t * e] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    using group_eq_pow_eq_mod order_gt_0 by blast
  hence "[int z + int t * int e' = int z' +  int t * int e] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_int_iff by force
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt cong_iff_lin)
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: â€¹[int z - int z' = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod int (order ğ’¢))â€º right_diff_distrib)
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    by (meson cong_diff cong_mod_left cong_mult cong_refl cong_trans)
  hence *: "[int z - int z' = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    using assms
    by (simp add: int_ops(9) of_nat_diff)
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * nat (int e - int e')] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    using assms 
    by auto
  hence **: "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)) 
              = int t * (nat (int e - int e')
                  * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)))] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt â€¹[int z - int z' = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod int (order ğ’¢))â€º assms(1) assms(2)
          cong_scalar_right int_nat_eq less_imp_of_nat_less mod_less more_arith_simps(11) nat_less_iff of_nat_0_le_iff)
  hence "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)) = int t * 1] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) gcd inverse assms(2) cong_scalar_left cong_trans less_imp_diff_less mod_less mult.comm_neutral nat_minus_as_int)
  hence "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)) 
              = t] (mod  order ğ’¢)" by simp
  hence "[ ((int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)))mod order ğ’¢ 
              = t] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_mod_left by blast
  hence  **: "[nat (((int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)))mod order ğ’¢)
              = t] (mod  order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis Euclidean_Division.pos_mod_sign cong_int_iff int_nat_eq of_nat_0_less_iff order_gt_0)
  hence "â™g [^] (nat (((int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((nat (int e - int e'))) (order ğ’¢)))mod order ğ’¢)) = â™g [^] t"
    using cyclic_group.pow_generator_eq_iff_cong cyclic_group_axioms order_gt_0 order_gt_0_iff_finite by blast
  thus ?thesis using t 
    by (smt Euclidean_Division.pos_mod_sign discrete_log.order_gt_0 int_pow_def2 nat_minus_as_int of_nat_0_less_iff)
qed

lemma hvzk_xr'_rewrite:
  assumes r: "r < order ğ’¢"
  shows "((w*c + r) mod (order ğ’¢) mod (order ğ’¢) + (order ğ’¢) * w*c - w*c) mod (order ğ’¢) = r"
(is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have "?lhs = (w*c + r  + (order ğ’¢) * w*c- w*c) mod (order ğ’¢)" 
    by (metis Nat.add_diff_assoc Num.of_nat_simps(1) One_nat_def add_less_same_cancel2 less_imp_le_nat 
        mod_add_left_eq mult.assoc mult_0_right n_less_m_mult_n nat_neq_iff not_add_less2 of_nat_0_le_iff prime_gt_1_nat prime_order) 
  thus ?thesis using r 
    by (metis ab_semigroup_add_class.add_ac(1) ab_semigroup_mult_class.mult_ac(1) diff_add_inverse mod_if mod_mult_self2)
qed

lemma hvzk_h_sub_rewrite:
  assumes "h = â™g [^] w"  
    and z: "z < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢)* w * c - w*c)) = â™g [^] z âŠ— inv (h [^] c)" 
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof(cases "w = 0")
  case True
  then show ?thesis using assms by simp
next
  case w_gt_0: False
  then show ?thesis 
  proof-
    have "(z + order ğ’¢ * w * c - w * c) = (z + (order ğ’¢ * w * c- w * c))"
      using z by (simp add: less_imp_le_nat mult_le_mono) 
    then have lhs: "?lhs = â™g [^] z âŠ— â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢) * w *c - w*c)" 
      by(simp add: nat_pow_mult)
    have " â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢) * w *c - w*c) =  inv (h [^] c)"  
    proof(cases "c = 0")
      case True
      then show ?thesis using lhs by simp
    next
      case False
      hence *: "((order ğ’¢)*w *c - w*c) > 0" using assms w_gt_0 
        using gr0I mult_less_cancel2 n_less_m_mult_n numeral_nat(7) prime_gt_1_nat prime_order zero_less_diff by presburger
      then have " â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c - w*c) =  â™g [^] int ((order ğ’¢)*w*c - w*c)"
        by (simp add: int_pow_int) 
      also have "... = â™g [^] int ((order ğ’¢)*w*c) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (w*c))" 
        using int_pow_diff[of "â™g" "order ğ’¢ * w * c" "w * c"] * generator_closed int_ops(6) int_pow_neg int_pow_neg_int by presburger

      also have "... = â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c) âŠ— inv (â™g [^] (w*c))"
        by (metis int_pow_int) 
      also have "... = â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c) âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] w) [^] c)"
        by(simp add: nat_pow_pow)
      also have "... = â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c) âŠ— inv (h [^] c)"
        using assms by simp
      also have "... = ğŸ­ âŠ— inv (h [^] c)"
        using generator_pow_order
        by (metis generator_closed mult_is_0 nat_pow_0 nat_pow_pow)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (simp add: assms(1)) 
    qed
    then show ?thesis using lhs by simp
  qed
qed

lemma hvzk_h_sub2_rewrite:
  assumes  "h' = g' [^] w" 
    and z: "z < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "g' [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢)*w*c - w*c))  = g' [^] z âŠ— inv (h' [^] c)" 
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof(cases "w = 0")
  case True
  then show ?thesis 
    using assms by (simp add: g'_def)
next
  case w_gt_0: False
  then show ?thesis 
  proof-
    have "g' = â™g [^] x" using g'_def by simp
    have g'_carrier: "g' âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" using g'_def by simp
    have 1: "g' [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c- w*c) = inv (h' [^] c)"
    proof(cases "c = 0")
      case True
      then show ?thesis by simp
    next
      case False
      hence *: "((order ğ’¢)*w*c - w*c) > 0" 
        using assms mult_strict_mono w_gt_0 prime_gt_1_nat prime_order by auto 
      then have " g' [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c - w*c) = g' [^] (int (order ğ’¢ * w * c) - int (w * c))"
        by (metis int_ops(6) int_pow_int of_nat_0_less_iff order.irrefl)
      also have "... = g' [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c) âŠ— inv (g' [^] (w*c))" 
        by (metis g'_carrier int_pow_diff int_pow_int) 
      also have "... = g' [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c) âŠ— inv (h' [^] c)"
        by(simp add: nat_pow_pow assms)
      also have "... = ğŸ­ âŠ— inv (h' [^] c)" 
        by (metis g'_carrier nat_pow_one nat_pow_pow pow_order_eq_1)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (simp add: assms(1)) 
    qed
    have "(z + order ğ’¢ * w * c - w * c) = (z + (order ğ’¢ * w * c - w * c))"
      using z by (simp add: less_imp_le_nat mult_le_mono) 
    then have lhs: "?lhs = g' [^] z âŠ— g' [^] ((order ğ’¢)*w*c - w*c)" 
      by(auto simp add: nat_pow_mult)
    then show ?thesis using 1 by simp
  qed
qed

lemma hv_zk2:
  assumes "(H, w) âˆˆ R" 
  shows "chaum_ped_sigma.R H w c = chaum_ped_sigma.S H c"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have H: "H = (â™g [^] (w::nat), g' [^] w)" 
    using assms R_def  by(simp add: prod.expand)
  have g'_carrier: "g' âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" using g'_def by simp
  have "chaum_ped_sigma.R H w c  = do {
    let (h, h') = H;
    r â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let z = (w*c + r) mod (order ğ’¢);
    let a = â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢) * w*c - w*c) mod (order ğ’¢));

    using assms hvzk_xr'_rewrite 
    by(simp cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  also have "... = do {
    let (h, h') = H;
    z â† map_spmf (Î» r. (w*c + r) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    let a = â™g [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢) * w*c - w*c) mod (order ğ’¢)); 
    let a' = g' [^] ((z + (order ğ’¢) * w*c - w*c) mod (order ğ’¢));

  also have "... = do {

    z â† (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));

lemma ss_rewrite1:
  assumes "fst h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and "a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and e: "e < order ğ’¢" 
    and "a âŠ— fst h [^] e = â™g [^] z"  
    and e': "e' < e"
    and "a âŠ— fst h [^] e' = â™g [^] z'"
  shows "fst h = â™g [^] ((int z - int z') * inverse (e - e') (order ğ’¢) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
proof-
  have gcd: "gcd (e - e') (order ğ’¢) = 1" 
    using e e' prime_field prime_order by simp
  have "a = â™g [^] z âŠ— inv (fst h [^] e)" 
    using assms
    by (simp add: assms inv_solve_right)
  moreover have "a = â™g [^] z' âŠ— inv (fst h [^] e')" 
    using assms
    by (simp add: assms inv_solve_right)
  ultimately have "â™g [^] z âŠ— fst h [^] e' = â™g [^] z' âŠ— fst h [^] e"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) assms cyclic_group_assoc cyclic_group_commute nat_pow_closed)
  moreover obtain t :: nat where t: "fst h = â™g [^] t"
    using assms generatorE by blast
  ultimately have "â™g [^] (z + t * e') = â™g [^] (z' + t * e)" 
    using nat_pow_pow 
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult)
  hence "[z + t * e' = z' + t * e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using group_eq_pow_eq_mod or_gt_0 by blast
  hence "[int z + int t * int e' = int z' + int t * int e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_int_iff by force
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt cong_diff_iff_cong_0)
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: right_diff_distrib)
  hence "[int z - int z' = int t * (e - e')] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
    using assms by (simp add: of_nat_diff)
  hence "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))  = int t * (e - e') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_scalar_right by blast
  hence "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))  = int t * ((e - e') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
    by (simp add: more_arith_simps(11))
  hence "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))  = int t * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) cong_scalar_left cong_trans inverse gcd)
  hence "[(int z - int z') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢  = t] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
    by simp
  hence "[nat ((int z - int z') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢)  = t] (mod order ğ’¢)" 
    by (metis cong_def int_ops(9) mod_mod_trivial nat_int)
  hence "â™g [^] (nat ((int z - int z') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢))  = â™g [^] t" 
    using order_gt_0 order_gt_0_iff_finite pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  thus ?thesis using t by simp
qed

lemma ss_rewrite2:
  assumes "fst h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and "snd h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and "a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and "b âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and "e < order ğ’¢" 
    and "a âŠ— fst h [^] e = â™g [^] z" 
    and "b âŠ— snd h [^] e = g' [^] z"
    and "e' < e" 
    and "a âŠ— fst h [^] e' = â™g [^] z'"
    and "b âŠ— snd h [^] e' = g' [^] z'"
  shows "snd h = g' [^] ((int z - int z') * inverse (e - e') (order ğ’¢) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
proof-
  have gcd: "gcd (e - e') (order ğ’¢) = 1" 
    using prime_field assms prime_order by simp
  have "b = g' [^] z âŠ— inv (snd h [^] e)"
    by (simp add: assms inv_solve_right)
  moreover have "b = g' [^] z' âŠ— inv (snd h [^] e')"
    by (metis assms(2) assms(4) assms(10) g'_def generator_closed group.inv_solve_right' group_l_invI l_inv_ex nat_pow_closed)
  ultimately have "g' [^] z âŠ— snd h [^] e' = g' [^] z' âŠ— snd h [^] e" 
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) assms cyclic_group_assoc cyclic_group_commute nat_pow_closed)
  moreover obtain t :: nat where t: "snd h = â™g [^] t"
    using assms(2) generatorE by blast
  ultimately have "â™g [^] (x * z + t * e') = â™g [^] (x * z' + t * e)"
    using g'_def nat_pow_pow
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult) 
  hence "[x * z + t * e' = x * z' + t * e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using group_eq_pow_eq_mod order_gt_0 by blast
  hence "[int x * int z + int t * int e' = int x * int z' + int t * int e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis Groups.add_ac(2) Groups.mult_ac(2) cong_int_iff int_ops(7) int_plus)
  hence "[int x * int z - int x * int z' = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt cong_diff_iff_cong_0)
  hence "[int x * (int z - int z') = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: int_distrib(4))
  hence "[int x * (int z - int z') = int t * (e - e')] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using assms by (simp add: of_nat_diff)
  hence "[(int x * (int z - int z')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t * (e - e') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_scalar_right by blast
  hence "[(int x * (int z - int z')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t * ((e - e') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: more_arith_simps(11))
  hence *: "[(int x * (int z - int z')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) cong_scalar_left cong_trans gcd inverse)
  hence "[nat ((int x * (int z - int z')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢) = t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis cong_def cong_mod_right more_arith_simps(6) nat_int zmod_int)
  hence "â™g [^] (nat ((int x * (int z - int z')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢)) = â™g [^] t"
    using order_gt_0 order_gt_0_iff_finite pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  thus ?thesis using t 
    by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) * cong_def g'_def generator_closed int_pow_int int_pow_pow mod_mult_right_eq more_arith_simps(11) more_arith_simps(6) pow_generator_mod_int)
qed

lemma ss_rewrite_snd_h:
  assumes e_e'_mod: "e' mod order ğ’¢ < e mod order ğ’¢"
    and h_mem: "snd h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and a_mem: "snd a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and a1: "snd a âŠ— snd h [^] e = g' [^] z" 
    and a2: "snd a âŠ— snd h [^] e' = g' [^] z'" 
  shows "snd h = g' [^] ((int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
proof-
  have gcd: "gcd ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢) = 1"
    using prime_field 
    by (simp add: assms less_imp_diff_less linorder_not_le prime_order)
  have "snd a = g' [^] z âŠ— inv (snd h [^] e)"
    using a1 
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Group.group.axioms(1) h_mem a_mem group.inv_closed group_l_invI l_inv_ex monoid.m_assoc nat_pow_closed r_inv r_one)
  moreover have "snd a = g' [^] z' âŠ— inv (snd h [^] e')"
    by (metis a2 h_mem a_mem g'_def generator_closed group.inv_solve_right' group_l_invI l_inv_ex nat_pow_closed)
  ultimately have "g' [^] z âŠ— snd h [^] e' = g' [^] z' âŠ— snd h [^] e" 
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) a2 h_mem a_mem a1 cyclic_group_assoc cyclic_group_commute nat_pow_closed)
  moreover obtain t :: nat where t: "snd h = â™g [^] t"
    using assms(2) generatorE by blast
  ultimately have "â™g [^] (x * z + t * e') = â™g [^] (x * z' + t * e)"
    using g'_def nat_pow_pow
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult) 
  hence "[x * z + t * e' = x * z' + t * e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using group_eq_pow_eq_mod order_gt_0 by blast
  hence "[int x * int z + int t * int e' = int x * int z' + int t * int e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis Groups.add_ac(2) Groups.mult_ac(2) cong_int_iff int_ops(7) int_plus)
  hence "[int x * int z - int x * int z' = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt cong_diff_iff_cong_0)
  hence "[int x * (int z - int z') = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: int_distrib(4))
  hence "[int x * (int z - int z') = int t * (int e mod order ğ’¢ - int e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) cong_def mod_diff_eq mod_mod_trivial mod_mult_right_eq)
  hence *: "[int x * (int z - int z') = int t * (e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: assms(1) int_ops(9) less_imp_le_nat of_nat_diff)
  hence "[int x * (int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) 
               = int t * ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢ 
                  * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) cong_mod_right cong_scalar_right less_imp_diff_less mod_if more_arith_simps(11) or_gt_0 unique_euclidean_semiring_numeral_class.pos_mod_bound)
  hence "[int x * (int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) 
               = int t * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (meson Number_Theory_Aux.inverse * gcd cong_scalar_left cong_trans)
  hence "â™g [^] (int x * (int z - int z') * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢))) = â™g [^] t"
    by (metis cong_def int_pow_int more_arith_simps(6) pow_generator_mod_int)
  thus ?thesis using t 
    by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) g'_def generator_closed int_pow_int int_pow_pow mod_mult_right_eq more_arith_simps(11) pow_generator_mod_int)
qed

lemma completeness: 
  shows "Î£_protocols_base.completeness"
proof-
  have "(â™g [^] ((e * fst w' + y) mod order ğ’¢) âŠ— g' [^] ((e * snd w' + ya) mod order ğ’¢) = â™g [^] y âŠ— g' [^] ya âŠ— (â™g [^] fst w' âŠ— g' [^] snd w') [^] e)" 
    for e y ya :: nat and w' :: "nat Ã— nat"
  proof-
    have "â™g [^] ((e * fst w' + y) mod order ğ’¢) âŠ— g' [^] ((e * snd w' + ya) mod order ğ’¢) = â™g [^] ((y + e * fst w')) âŠ— g' [^] ((ya + e * snd w'))"
      by (simp add: cyclic_group.pow_carrier_mod cyclic_group_axioms g'_def add.commute pow_generator_mod)
    also have "... = â™g [^] y âŠ— â™g [^] (e * fst w') âŠ— g' [^] ya âŠ— g' [^] (e * snd w')" 
      by (simp add: g'_def m_assoc nat_pow_mult)
    also have "... = â™g [^] y âŠ— g' [^] ya âŠ— â™g [^] (e * fst w') âŠ— g' [^] (e * snd w')" 
      by (smt add.commute g'_def generator_closed m_assoc nat_pow_closed nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow)
    also have "... = â™g [^] y âŠ— g' [^] ya âŠ— ((â™g [^] fst w') [^] e âŠ— (g' [^] snd w') [^] e)" 
      by (simp add: m_assoc mult.commute nat_pow_pow)
    also have "... =  â™g [^] y âŠ— g' [^] ya âŠ— ((â™g [^] fst w' âŠ— g' [^] snd w') [^] e)"

  qed

lemma hvzk_z_r:
  assumes r1: "r1 < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "r1 = ((r1 + c * (x1 :: nat)) mod (order ğ’¢) + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)"
proof(cases "x1 = 0")
  case True
  then show ?thesis using r1 by simp
next
  case x1_neq_0: False
  have z1_eq: "[(r1 + c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢) + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 = r1 + c * x1] (mod (order ğ’¢))"
    using gr_implies_not_zero order_gt_1
    by (simp add: Groups.mult_ac(1) cong_def)
  hence "[(r1 + c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢) + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1 = r1] (mod (order ğ’¢))" 
  proof(cases "c = 0")
    case True
    then show ?thesis 
      using z1_eq by auto
  next
    case False
    have "order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1 > 0" using x1_neq_0 False 
      using prime_gt_1_nat prime_order by auto 
    thus ?thesis 
      by (smt Groups.add_ac(2) add_diff_inverse_nat cong_add_lcancel_nat diff_is_0_eq le_simps(1) neq0_conv trans_less_add2 z1_eq zero_less_diff)
  qed
  thus ?thesis 
    by (simp add: r1 cong_def)
qed

lemma hvzk_z1_r1_tuple_rewrite: 
  assumes r1: "r1 < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "(â™g [^] r1 âŠ— g' [^] r2, c, (r1 + c * x1) mod order ğ’¢, (r2 + c * x2) mod order ğ’¢) = 
              (â™g [^] (((r1 + c * x1) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod order ğ’¢)  
                  âŠ— g' [^] r2, c, (r1 + c * x1) mod order ğ’¢, (r2 + c * x2) mod order ğ’¢)"
proof-
  have "â™g [^] r1 = â™g [^] (((r1 + c * x1) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod order ğ’¢)"
    using assms hvzk_z_r by simp
  thus ?thesis by argo
qed

lemma hvzk_z2_r2_tuple_rewrite: 
  assumes "xb < order ğ’¢" 
  shows "(â™g [^] (((x' + xa * x1) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * xa * x1 - xa * x1) mod order ğ’¢) 
            âŠ— g' [^] xb, xa, (x' + xa * x1) mod order ğ’¢, (xb + xa * x2) mod order ğ’¢) =
               (â™g [^] (((x' + xa * x1) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * xa * x1 - xa * x1) mod order ğ’¢) 
                âŠ— g' [^] (((xb + xa * x2) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * xa * x2 - xa * x2) mod order ğ’¢), xa, (x' + xa * x1) mod order ğ’¢, (xb + xa * x2) mod order ğ’¢)"

  have "g' [^] xb = g' [^] (((xb + xa * x2) mod order ğ’¢ + order ğ’¢ * xa * x2 - xa * x2) mod order ğ’¢)"
    using hvzk_z_r assms by simp
    thus ?thesis by argo
qed

lemma hvzk_sim_inverse_rewrite: 
  assumes h: "h =  â™g [^] (x1 :: nat) âŠ— g' [^] (x2 :: nat)"
  shows "â™g [^] (((z1::nat) + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) 
            âŠ— g' [^] (((z2::nat) + order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢))
                = (â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2) âŠ— (inv h [^] c)"
(is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have in_carrier1: "(g' [^] x2) [^] c âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp 
  have in_carrier2: "(â™g [^] x1) [^] c âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" by simp
  have pow_distrib1: "order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1 = (order ğ’¢ - 1) * c * x1" 
    and pow_distrib2: "order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2 = (order ğ’¢ - 1) * c * x2" 
    using assms by (simp add: diff_mult_distrib)+
  have "?lhs = â™g [^] (z1 + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) âŠ— g' [^] (z2 + order ğ’¢ * c  * x2 - c * x2)"
    by (simp add: pow_carrier_mod)
  also have "... = â™g [^] (z1 + (order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1)) âŠ— g' [^] (z2 + (order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2))" 
    using h 
    by (smt Nat.add_diff_assoc diff_zero le_simps(1) nat_0_less_mult_iff neq0_conv pow_distrib1 pow_distrib2 prime_gt_1_nat prime_order zero_less_diff)
  also have "... =  â™g [^] z1 âŠ— â™g [^] (order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— g' [^] (order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2)"
    using nat_pow_mult 
    by (simp add: m_assoc) 
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— â™g [^] (order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) âŠ— g' [^] (order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2)"
    by (smt add.commute g'_def generator_closed m_assoc nat_pow_closed nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow)
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— â™g [^] ((order ğ’¢ - 1) * c * x1) âŠ— g' [^] ((order ğ’¢ - 1) * c * x2)" 
    using pow_distrib1 pow_distrib2 by argo
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— (â™g [^] (order ğ’¢ - 1)) [^] (c * x1) âŠ— (g' [^] ((order ğ’¢ - 1))) [^] (c * x2)" 
    by (simp add: more_arith_simps(11) nat_pow_pow)
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— (inv (â™g [^] c)) [^] x1 âŠ— (inv (g' [^] c)) [^] x2"
    using assms neg_power_inverse  inverse_pow_pow nat_pow_pow prime_gt_1_nat prime_order by auto
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— (inv ((â™g [^] c) [^] x1)) âŠ— (inv ((g' [^] c) [^] x2))" 
    by (simp add: inverse_pow_pow)
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— ((inv ((â™g [^] x1) [^] c)) âŠ— (inv ((g' [^] x2) [^] c)))" 
    by (simp add: mult.commute cyclic_group_assoc nat_pow_pow)
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— inv ((â™g [^] x1) [^] c âŠ— (g' [^] x2) [^] c)"
    using inverse_split in_carrier2 in_carrier1 by simp
  also have "... = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2 âŠ— inv (h [^] c)" 
    using h  cyclic_group_commute monoid_comm_monoidI 
    by (simp add: pow_mult_distrib)
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by (simp add: h inverse_pow_pow)
qed

lemma hv_zk: 
  assumes "h =  â™g [^] x1 âŠ— g' [^] x2"
  shows "Î£_protocols_base.R h (x1,x2) c = Î£_protocols_base.S h c"
  including monad_normalisation
proof-
  have "Î£_protocols_base.R h (x1,x2) c = do { 
    r1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    r2 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let z1 = (r1 + c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢);
    let z2 = (r2 + c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢);
    return_spmf ( â™g [^] r1 âŠ— g' [^] r2 ,c,(z1,z2))}"
      by(simp add: Î£_protocols_base.R_def R2_def; simp add: add.commute init_def split_def response_def)
    also have "... = do { 
    r2 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    z1 â† map_spmf (Î» r1. (r1 + c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    let z2 = (r2 + c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢);
    return_spmf (â™g [^] ((z1 + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) âŠ— g' [^] r2 ,c,(z1,z2))}"
      by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def hvzk_z1_r1_tuple_rewrite assms cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  also have "... = do { 
    z1 â† map_spmf (Î» r1. (r1 + c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    z2 â† map_spmf (Î» r2. (r2 + c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    return_spmf (â™g [^] ((z1 + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) âŠ— g' [^] ((z2 + order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢)) ,c,(z1,z2))}"
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def hvzk_z2_r2_tuple_rewrite cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  also have "... = do { 
    z1 â† map_spmf (Î» r1. (c * x1 + r1) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    z2 â† map_spmf (Î» r2. (c * x2 + r2) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    return_spmf (â™g [^] ((z1 + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) âŠ— g' [^] ((z2 + order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢)) ,c,(z1,z2))}"
    by(simp add: add.commute)
  also have "... = do { 
    z1 â† (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    z2 â† (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    return_spmf (â™g [^] ((z1 + order ğ’¢ * c * x1 - c * x1) mod (order ğ’¢)) âŠ— g' [^] ((z2 + order ğ’¢ * c * x2 - c * x2) mod (order ğ’¢)) ,c,(z1,z2))}"
      by(simp add: samp_uni_plus_one_time_pad)
  also have "... = do { 
    z1 â† (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    z2 â† (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    return_spmf ((â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z2) âŠ— (inv h [^] c) ,c,(z1,z2))}"
      by(simp add: hvzk_sim_inverse_rewrite assms cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp) 
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by(simp add: Î£_protocols_base.S_def S2_def bind_map_spmf map_spmf_conv_bind_spmf)
qed

lemma ss_rewrite:
  assumes "h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and "a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢"
    and "e < order ğ’¢" 
    and "â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z1' = a âŠ— h [^] e"
    and "e' < e"
    and "â™g [^] z2 âŠ— g' [^] z2' = a âŠ— h [^] e' "
  shows "h = â™g [^] ((int z1 - int z2) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) âŠ— g' [^] ((int z1' - int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
proof-
  have gcd: "gcd (e - e') (order ğ’¢) = 1"
    using prime_field assms prime_order by simp 
  have "â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z1' âŠ— inv (h [^] e) = a" 
    by (simp add: inv_solve_right' assms)
  moreover have "â™g [^] z2 âŠ— g' [^] z2' âŠ— inv (h [^] e') = a" 
    by (simp add: assms inv_solve_right')
  ultimately have "â™g [^] z2 âŠ— g' [^] z2' âŠ— inv (h [^] e') = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— g' [^] z1' âŠ— inv (h [^] e)"
    using g'_def by (simp add: nat_pow_pow)
  moreover obtain t :: nat where t: "h = â™g [^] t" 
    using assms generatorE by blast
  ultimately have "â™g [^] z2 âŠ— â™g [^] (x * z2') âŠ— â™g [^] (t * e) = â™g [^] z1 âŠ— â™g [^] (x * z1') âŠ— (â™g [^] (t * e'))" 
    using assms(2) assms(4) cyclic_group_commute m_assoc g'_def nat_pow_pow by auto
  hence "â™g [^] (z2 + x * z2' + t * e) = â™g [^] (z1 + x * z1' + t * e')"  
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult)
  hence "[z2 + x * z2' + t * e = z1 + x * z1' + t * e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using group_eq_pow_eq_mod order_gt_0 by blast
  hence "[int z2 + int x * int z2' + int t * int e = int z1 + int x * int z1' + int t * int e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_int_iff by force
  hence "[int z1 + int x * int z1' - int z2 - int x * int z2' = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt cong_diff_iff_cong_0 cong_sym)
  hence "[int z1 + int x * int z1' - int z2 - int x * int z2' = int t * (e - e')] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using int_distrib(4) assms by (simp add: of_nat_diff)
  hence "[(int z1 + int x * int z1' - int z2 - int x * int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t * (e - e') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_scalar_right by blast
  hence "[(int z1 + int x * int z1' - int z2 - int x * int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t * ((e - e') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)))] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: mult.assoc)
  hence "[(int z1 + int x * int z1' - int z2 - int x * int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) cong_scalar_left cong_trans inverse gcd)
  hence "[(int z1 - int z2 + int x * int z1' - int x * int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by smt
  hence "[(int z1 - int z2 + int x * (int z1' - int z2')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) = int t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (simp add: Rings.ring_distribs(4) add_diff_eq)
  hence "[nat ((int z1 - int z2 + int x * (int z1' - int z2')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod (order ğ’¢)) = int t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by auto
  hence "â™g [^] (nat ((int z1 - int z2 + int x * (int z1' - int z2')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) mod (order ğ’¢))) = â™g [^] t"
    using cong_int_iff finite_carrier pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by blast
  hence "â™g [^] ((int z1 - int z2 + int x * (int z1' - int z2')) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))) = â™g [^] t"
    using pow_generator_mod_int by auto
  hence "â™g [^] ((int z1 - int z2) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢)) + int x * (int z1' - int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))) = â™g [^] t"
    by (metis Rings.ring_distribs(2) t)
  hence "â™g [^] ((int z1 - int z2) * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))) âŠ— â™g [^] (int x * (int z1' - int z2') * fst (bezw (e - e') (order ğ’¢))) = â™g [^] t"
    using int_pow_mult by auto
  thus ?thesis 
    by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) g'_def generator_closed int_pow_int int_pow_pow mod_mult_right_eq more_arith_simps(11) pow_generator_mod_int t)
qed

lemma 
  assumes h_mem: "h âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and a_mem: "a âˆˆ carrier ğ’¢" 
    and a: "â™g [^] fst z âŠ— g' [^] snd z = a âŠ— h [^] e"
    and a': "â™g [^] fst z' âŠ— g' [^] snd z' = a âŠ— h [^] e'"
    and e_e'_mod: "e' mod order ğ’¢ < e mod order ğ’¢"
  shows "h = â™g [^] ((int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) 
              âŠ— g' [^] ((int (snd z) - int (snd z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))"
proof-
  have gcd: "gcd ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢) = 1"
    using prime_field 
    by (simp add: assms less_imp_diff_less linorder_not_le prime_order)
  have "â™g [^] fst z âŠ— g' [^] snd z âŠ— inv (h [^] e) = a" 
    using a h_mem a_mem by (simp add: inv_solve_right')
  moreover have "â™g [^] fst z' âŠ— g' [^] snd z' âŠ— inv (h [^] e') = a" 
    using a h_mem a_mem by (simp add: assms(4) inv_solve_right')
  ultimately have "â™g [^] fst z âŠ— â™g [^] (x * snd z) âŠ— inv (h [^] e) = â™g [^] fst z' âŠ— â™g [^] (x * snd z') âŠ— inv (h [^] e')"
    using g'_def by (simp add: nat_pow_pow)
  moreover obtain t :: nat where t: "h = â™g [^] t" 
    using h_mem generatorE by blast
  ultimately have "â™g [^] fst z âŠ— â™g [^] (x * snd z) âŠ— â™g [^] (t * e') = â™g [^] fst z' âŠ— â™g [^] (x * snd z') âŠ— â™g [^] (t * e)"
    using a_mem assms(3) assms(4) cyclic_group_assoc cyclic_group_commute g'_def nat_pow_pow by auto
  hence "â™g [^] (fst z + x * snd z + t * e') = â™g [^] (fst z' + x * snd z' + t * e)"
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult)
  hence "[fst z + x * snd z + t * e' = fst z' + x * snd z' + t * e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using group_eq_pow_eq_mod order_gt_0 by blast
  hence "[int (fst z) + int x * int (snd z) + int t * int e' = int (fst z') + int x * int (snd z') + int t * int e] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_int_iff by force
  hence "[int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * int (snd z) - int x * int (snd z') =  int t * int e - int t  * int e'] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (smt cong_diff_iff_cong_0)
  hence "[int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')) =  int t * (int e -  int e')] (mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof -
    have "[int (fst z) + (int (x * snd z) - (int (fst z') + int (x * snd z'))) = int t * (int e - int e')] (mod int (order ğ’¢))"
      by (simp add: Rings.ring_distribs(4) â€¹[int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * int (snd z) - int x * int (snd z') = int t * int e - int t * int e'] (mod int (order ğ’¢))â€º add_diff_add add_diff_eq)
    then have "âˆƒi. [int (fst z) + (int x * int (snd z) - (int (fst z') + i * int (snd z'))) = int t * (int e - int e') + int (snd z') * (int x - i)] (mod int (order ğ’¢))"
      by (metis (no_types) add.commute arith_simps(49) cancel_comm_monoid_add_class.diff_cancel int_ops(7) mult_eq_0_iff)
    then have "âˆƒi. [int (fst z) - int (fst z') + (int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')) + i) = int t * (int e - int e') + i] (mod int (order ğ’¢))"
      by (metis (no_types) add_diff_add add_diff_eq mult_diff_mult mult_of_nat_commute)
    then show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types) add.assoc cong_add_rcancel)
  qed
  hence "[int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')) =  int t * (int e mod order ğ’¢ - int e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) cong_def mod_diff_eq mod_mod_trivial mod_mult_right_eq)
  hence "[int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')) =  int t * (e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using e_e'_mod 
    by (simp add: int_ops(9) of_nat_diff)
  hence "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z'))) 
            * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ 
               =  int t * (e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢ 
                  * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using cong_cong_mod_int cong_scalar_right by blast
  hence "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z'))) 
            * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ 
               =  int t * ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢ 
                  * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢)] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Groups.mult_ac(1) cong_mod_right less_imp_diff_less mod_less mod_mult_left_eq mod_mult_right_eq order_gt_0 unique_euclidean_semiring_numeral_class.pos_mod_bound)
  hence "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z') + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z'))) 
            * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ 
               =  int t * 1] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    using inverse gcd 
    by (smt Num.of_nat_simps(5) Number_Theory_Aux.inverse cong_def mod_mult_right_eq more_arith_simps(6) of_nat_1)
  hence "[((int (fst z) - int (fst z')) + (int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')))) 
            * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ 
               = int t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by auto
  hence "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢) + (int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z'))) 
            * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢) 
               = int t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) cong_mod_left distrib_right mod_mult_right_eq)
  hence "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ + (int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z'))) 
            * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢) 
               = t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof -
    have "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) = (int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))] (mod int (order ğ’¢))"
      by (metis (no_types) cong_def mod_mult_right_eq)
    then show ?thesis
      by (meson â€¹[(int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) + int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')) * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢)) = int t] (mod int (order ğ’¢))â€º cong_add_rcancel cong_mod_left cong_trans)
  qed
  hence "[(int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ + (int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z'))) 
            * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢
               = t] (mod order ğ’¢)"
  proof -
    have "int x * ((int (snd z) - int (snd z')) * (fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod int (order ğ’¢))) mod int (order ğ’¢) = int x * ((int (snd z) - int (snd z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢))) mod int (order ğ’¢) mod int (order ğ’¢)"
      by (metis (no_types) mod_mod_trivial mod_mult_right_eq)

  hence "â™g [^] ((int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢ + (int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')))

    by (metis cong_def int_pow_int pow_generator_mod_int)
  hence "â™g [^] ((int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢) âŠ— â™g [^] ((int x * (int (snd z) - int (snd z')))

  hence "â™g [^] ((int (fst z) - int (fst z')) * fst (bezw ((e mod order ğ’¢ - e' mod order ğ’¢) mod order ğ’¢) (order ğ’¢)) mod order ğ’¢) âŠ— â™g [^] ((int x * ((int (snd z) - int (snd z')))

lemma reduction_to_dis_log:
  shows "okamoto_Î£_commit.rel_advantage ğ’œ = dis_log.advantage (dis_log_alt.adversary2 ğ’œ)"
proof-
  have exp_rewrite: "â™g [^] w1 âŠ— g' [^] w2 =  â™g [^] (w1 + x * w2)" for w1 w2 :: nat
    by (simp add: nat_pow_mult nat_pow_pow g'_def)
  have "okamoto_Î£_commit.rel_game ğ’œ = TRY do {
    w1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    w2 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let h = (â™g [^] w1 âŠ— g' [^] w2);
    (w1',w2') â† ğ’œ h;
    return_spmf (h = â™g [^] w1' âŠ— g' [^] w2')} ELSE return_spmf False"
    unfolding okamoto_Î£_commit.rel_game_def
    by(simp add: Let_def split_def R_def G_def)
  also have "... = TRY do {
    w1 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    w2 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let w = (w1 + x * w2) mod (order ğ’¢);
    let h = â™g [^] w;
    (w1',w2') â† ğ’œ h;
    return_spmf (h = â™g [^] w1' âŠ— g' [^] w2')} ELSE return_spmf False"
    using g'_def exp_rewrite pow_generator_mod by simp
  also have "... = TRY do {
    w2 â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    w â† map_spmf (Î» w1. (x * w2 + w1) mod (order ğ’¢)) (sample_uniform (order ğ’¢));
    let h = â™g [^] w;
    (w1',w2') â† ğ’œ h;
    return_spmf (h = â™g [^] w1' âŠ— g' [^] w2')} ELSE return_spmf False"
    including monad_normalisation
    by(simp add: bind_map_spmf o_def Let_def add.commute)
  also have "... = TRY do {
    w2 :: nat â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    w â† sample_uniform (order ğ’¢);
    let h = â™g [^] w;
    (w1',w2') â† ğ’œ h;
    return_spmf (h = â™g [^] w1' âŠ— g' [^] w2')} ELSE return_spmf False"
    using samp_uni_plus_one_time_pad add.commute by simp
  also have "... = TRY do {

    let h = â™g [^] w;
    (w1',w2') â† ğ’œ h;
    return_spmf (h = â™g [^] w1' âŠ— g' [^] w2')} ELSE return_spmf False"
    by(simp add: bind_spmf_const)
  also have "... = dis_log_alt.dis_log2 ğ’œ"
    apply(simp add: dis_log_alt.dis_log2_def Let_def dis_log_alt.g'_def g'_def)
    apply(intro try_spmf_cong)
     apply(intro bind_spmf_cong[OF refl]; clarsimp?)
     apply auto
    using exp_rewrite pow_generator_mod g'_def 
     apply (metis group_eq_pow_eq_mod okamoto_axioms okamoto_base.order_gt_0 okamoto_def)
    using exp_rewrite g'_def order_gt_0_iff_finite pow_generator_eq_iff_cong by auto
  ultimately have "okamoto_Î£_commit.rel_game ğ’œ = dis_log_alt.dis_log2 ğ’œ"
    by simp
  hence "okamoto_Î£_commit.rel_advantage ğ’œ = dis_log_alt.advantage2 ğ’œ"
    by(simp add: okamoto_Î£_commit.rel_advantage_def dis_log_alt.advantage2_def)
  thus ?thesis

  if [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier L" "y âˆˆ carrier L" "z âˆˆ carrier L"

lemma compl_unique:
  assumes "x âŠ“ y = âŠ¥"
    and "x âŠ” y = âŠ¤"
    and [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier L" "y âˆˆ carrier L"
  shows "â™- x = y"

  have "(x âŠ“ â™- x) âŠ” (â™- x âŠ“ y) = (x âŠ“ y) âŠ” (â™- x âŠ“ y)"
    using inf_compl_bot assms(1) by simp
  then have "(â™- x âŠ“ x) âŠ” (â™- x âŠ“ y) = (y âŠ“ x) âŠ” (y âŠ“ â™- x)"
    by (simp add: meet_comm)
  then have "â™- x âŠ“ (x âŠ” y) = y âŠ“ (x âŠ” â™- x)"
    using assms(3) assms(4) compl_closed meet_join_distrib1 by presburger
  then have "â™- x âŠ“ âŠ¤ = y âŠ“ âŠ¤"
    by (simp add: assms(2))
  then show "â™- x = y"
    using le_iff_join top_higher by auto
qed

  and top_xor: "âŠ¤ âŠ• x = â™- x"

lemma xor_inverse [simp]: "x âŠ• x = âŠ¥" if "x âˆˆ carrier L"
  by(simp add: xor_def that)

lemma xor_left_inverse [simp]: "x âŠ• x âŠ• y = y" if "x âˆˆ carrier L" "y âˆˆ carrier L"
  using that xor_assoc by fastforce

lemmas xor_ac = xor_assoc xor_comm xor_left_comm

lemma inj_on_xor: "inj_on ((âŠ•) x) (carrier L)" if "x âˆˆ carrier L"
  by(rule inj_onI)(metis that xor_left_inverse)

lemma surj_xor: "(âŠ•) x ` carrier L = carrier L" if [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier L"
proof(rule Set.set_eqI, rule iffI)
  fix y
  assume [simp]: "y âˆˆ carrier L"
  have "x âŠ• y âˆˆ carrier L" by(simp)
  moreover have "y = x âŠ• (x âŠ• y)" by simp
  ultimately show "y âˆˆ (âŠ•) x ` carrier L" by(rule rev_image_eqI)
qed auto

lemma one_time_pad: "map_spmf ((âŠ•) x) (spmf_of_set (carrier L)) = spmf_of_set (carrier L)"
  if "x âˆˆ carrier L"
  apply(subst map_spmf_of_set_inj_on)
   apply(rule inj_on_xor[OF that])
  by(simp add: surj_xor that)

end

    if ((fst (fst  (snd (snd C1)))) â‰  (fst (fst (snd (snd C2))))) then do 
        {w0 :: 'witness0 â† ğ’œss0 (fst X) (fst (fst C1),fst (fst (snd (snd C1))),snd (fst (snd (snd C1)))) (fst (fst C2),fst (fst (snd (snd C2))),snd (fst (snd (snd C2)))); return_spmf (Inl w0)} 
    else
    do  {w1 :: 'witness1 â† ğ’œss1  (snd X) (snd (fst C1),fst (snd (snd (snd C1))), snd (snd (snd (snd C1)))) (snd (fst C2), fst (snd (snd (snd C2))), snd (snd (snd (snd C2)))); return_spmf (Inr w1)}}"

lemma ğ’œss_OR_alt_def: "ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0),e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'),e1',z1') = do {
    if (e0 â‰  e0') then do {w0 :: 'witness0 â† ğ’œss0 x0 (a0,e0,z0) (a0,e0',z0'); return_spmf (Inl w0)}
    else do {w1 :: 'witness1 â† ğ’œss1 x1 (a1,e1,z1) (a1,e1',z1'); return_spmf (Inr w1)}}"
  by(simp add: ğ’œss_OR_def)

definition "valid_pub_OR = {(x0,x1). x0 âˆˆ valid_pub0 âˆ§ x1 âˆˆ valid_pub1}"

sublocale Î£_OR: Î£_protocols_base init_OR response_OR check_OR Rel_OR S_OR ğ’œss_OR challenge_space valid_pub_OR 
  unfolding Î£_protocols_base_def
proof(goal_cases)
  case 1
  then show ?case 
  proof
    fix x 
    assume asm: "x âˆˆ Domain Rel_OR"
    then obtain x0 x1 where x: "(x0,x1) = x" 
      by (metis surj_pair)
    show "x âˆˆ valid_pub_OR"
    proof(cases "âˆƒ w0. (x0,w0) âˆˆ Rel0 âˆ§ x1 âˆˆ valid_pub1")
      case True
      then show ?thesis 
        using Î£0.domain_subset_valid_pub valid_pub_OR_def x by auto
    next
      case False
      hence "âˆƒ w1. (x1,w1) âˆˆ Rel1 âˆ§ x0 âˆˆ valid_pub0" 
        using Domain_Rel_cases asm x by auto
      then show ?thesis 
        using Î£1.domain_subset_valid_pub valid_pub_OR_def x by auto
    qed
  qed
qed

end

lemma ss: 
  assumes valid_pub_OR: "(x0,x1) âˆˆ valid_pub_OR" 
    and check: "check_OR (x0,x1) (a0,a1) s ((e0,z0), (e1,z1))"
    and check': "check_OR (x0,x1) (a0,a1) s' ((e0',z0'), (e1',z1'))"
    and "s â‰  s'"
    and challenge_space: "s âˆˆ challenge_space" "s' âˆˆ challenge_space"
  shows "lossless_spmf (ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0), e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'), e1',z1')) âˆ§
           (âˆ€w'âˆˆset_spmf (ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0), e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'), e1',z1')). ((x0,x1), w') âˆˆ Rel_OR)"
proof-
  have e_or: "e0 â‰  e0' âˆ¨ e1 â‰  e1'" using assms check_OR_def by auto
  show ?thesis 
  proof(cases "e0 â‰  e0'")
    case True
    moreover have 2: "x0 âˆˆ valid_pub0" 
      using valid_pub_OR valid_pub_OR_def by simp 
    moreover have 3: "check0 x0 a0 e0 z0" 
      using assms check_OR_def by simp 
    moreover have 4: "check0 x0 a0 e0' z0'"
      using assms check_OR_def by simp 
    moreover have e: "e0 âˆˆ carrier L" "e0' âˆˆ carrier L" 
      using challenge_space_def check check' check_OR_def by auto 
    ultimately have "(âˆ€w'âˆˆset_spmf (ğ’œss0 x0 (a0,e0,z0) (a0,e0',z0')). (x0, w') âˆˆ Rel0)" 
      using True Î£0.Î£_protocol_def Î£0.special_soundness_def Î£_prot0 challenge_space assms by blast
    moreover have  "lossless_spmf (ğ’œss0 x0 (a0, e0, z0) (a0, e0', z0'))"
      using 2 3 4 ğ’œss_OR_def True Î£_prot0  Î£0.Î£_protocol_def Î£0.special_soundness_def challenge_space_def e by blast
    ultimately have "âˆ€ w' âˆˆ set_spmf (ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0), e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'), e1',z1')). ((x0,x1),  w') âˆˆ Rel_OR"
      apply(auto simp only: ğ’œss_OR_alt_def True)
      apply(auto simp add: o_def ğ’œss_OR_def) 
      using assms valid_pub_OR_def by blast
    moreover have "lossless_spmf (ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0), e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'), e1',z1'))"
      apply(simp add: ğ’œss_OR_def)   
      using 2 3 4 True Î£_prot0  Î£0.Î£_protocol_def Î£0.special_soundness_def challenge_space e by blast
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  next
    case False
    hence e1_neq_e1': "e1 â‰  e1'" using e_or by simp
    moreover have 2: "x1 âˆˆ valid_pub1" 
      using valid_pub_OR valid_pub_OR_def by simp 
    moreover have 3: "check1 x1 a1 e1 z1" 
      using assms check_OR_def by simp
    moreover have 4: "check1 x1 a1 e1' z1'"
      using assms check_OR_def by simp 
    moreover have e: "e1 âˆˆ carrier L" "e1' âˆˆ carrier L" 
      using challenge_space_def check check' check_OR_def by auto
    ultimately have "(âˆ€w'âˆˆset_spmf (ğ’œss1 x1 (a1,e1,z1) (a1,e1',z1')). (x1,w') âˆˆ Rel1)" 
      using False Î£1.Î£_protocol_def Î£1.special_soundness_def Î£_prot1 e1_neq_e1' challenge_space by blast 
    hence "âˆ€w' âˆˆ set_spmf (ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0), e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'), e1',z1')). ((x0,x1), w') âˆˆ Rel_OR"
      apply(auto simp add: o_def ğ’œss_OR_def) 
      using False assms Î£1.L_def assms valid_pub_OR_def by auto    
    moreover have "lossless_spmf (ğ’œss_OR (x0,x1) ((a0,a1),s,(e0,z0), e1,z1) ((a0,a1),s',(e0',z0'), e1',z1'))"
      apply(simp add: ğ’œss_OR_def)  
      using 2 3 4 Î£_prot1 Î£1.Î£_protocol_def Î£1.special_soundness_def False e1_neq_e1' challenge_space e by blast
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed

lemma correct0: 
  assumes e_in_carrier: "e âˆˆ carrier L"
    and "(x0,w0) âˆˆ Rel0"
    and valid_pub: "x1 âˆˆ valid_pub1"
  shows "Î£_OR.completeness_game (x0,x1) (Inl w0) e = return_spmf True"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof-
  have "x âˆˆ carrier L âŸ¶ e = (e âŠ• x) âŠ• x" for x 
    using e_in_carrier xor_assoc by simp
  hence "?lhs = do {
    (r0,ab0) â† init0 x0 w0;
    eb' â† spmf_of_set (carrier L);
    (ab1', eb1'', zb1') â† Î£1.S x1 eb';
    let eb = e âŠ• eb';
    zb0 â† response0 r0 w0 eb;
    return_spmf ((check0 x0 ab0 eb zb0 âˆ§ check1 x1 ab1' eb' zb1'))}" 
    by(simp add: Î£_OR.completeness_game_def split_def Let_def challenge_space_def assms check_OR_def cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
  also have "... = do {
    eb' â† spmf_of_set (carrier L);
    (ab1', eb1'', zb1') â† Î£1.S x1 eb';
    let eb = e âŠ• eb';
    (r0,ab0) â† init0 x0 w0;
    zb0 â† response0 r0 w0 eb;
    return_spmf ((check0 x0 ab0 eb zb0 âˆ§ check1 x1 ab1' eb' zb1'))}" 
    apply(simp add: Let_def split_def)
    apply(rewrite bind_commute_spmf)
    apply(rewrite bind_commute_spmf[of _ "Î£1.S _ _"])
    by simp
  also have "... = do {
    eb' :: 'e â† spmf_of_set (carrier L);
    (ab1', eb1'', zb1') â† Î£1.S x1 eb';
    return_spmf (check1 x1 ab1' eb' zb1')}" 
    apply(simp add: Let_def)
    apply(intro bind_spmf_cong; clarsimp?)+
    subgoal for e' a e z
      apply(cases "check1 x1 a e' z")
      using Î£0.complete_game_return_true Î£_prot0 Î£0.completeness_game_def Î£0.Î£_protocol_def  
      by(auto simp add: assms bind_spmf_const lossless_init lossless_response lossless_weight_spmfD split_def cong: bind_spmf_cong_simp)
    done
  also have "... = do {
    eb' :: 'e â† spmf_of_set (carrier L);
    (ab1', eb1'', zb1') â† Î£1.S x1 eb';
    return_spmf (True)}"
    apply(intro bind_spmf_cong; clarsimp?)
    subgoal for x a aa b
      using  Î£_prot1 
      apply(auto simp add: Î£1.S_def split_def image_def Î£1.HVZK_unfold2_alt)  
      using Î£1.S_def split_def image_def Î£1.HVZK_unfold2_alt Î£_prot1 valid_pub by blast
    done
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using Î£1.HVZK_unfold2_alt
    by(simp add: bind_spmf_const Let_def Î£1.HVZK_unfold2_alt split_def lossless_Î£_S lossless_weight_spmfD carrier_L_not_empty finite_L)
qed

lemma correct1: 
  assumes rel1: "(x1,w1) âˆˆ Rel1"
    and valid_pub: "x0 âˆˆ valid_pub0"
    and e_in_carrier: "e âˆˆ carrier L"

  have "x âˆˆ carrier L âŸ¶ e = x âŠ• e âŠ• x" for x

  also have "... = do {

    using Î£0.complete_game_return_true Î£_OR.completeness_game_def
    by(simp add: bind_spmf_const split_def lossless_Î£_S(2) lossless_weight_spmfD Let_def carrier_L_not_empty finite_L)

lemma completeness':
  assumes  Rel_OR_asm: "((x0,x1), w) âˆˆ Rel_OR" 
  shows "âˆ€ e âˆˆ carrier L. spmf (Î£_OR.completeness_game (x0,x1) w e) True = 1" 
proof
  fix e
  assume asm: "e âˆˆ carrier L"
  hence "(Î£_OR.completeness_game (x0,x1) w e) = return_spmf True"
  proof(cases w)
    case inl: (Inl a)
    then show ?thesis 
      using asm correct0 assms inl by auto
  next
    case inr: (Inr b)
    then show ?thesis 
      using asm correct1 assms inr by auto
  qed
  thus "spmf (Î£_OR.completeness_game (x0,x1) w e) True = 1" 
    by simp
qed

  unfolding Î£_OR.completeness_def
  using completeness' challenge_space_def by auto

 by(simp add: completeness HVZK special_soundness Î£_OR.Î£_protocol_def)
